definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: In the end, the author hopes it may provide some useful clues to the exploration of gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 企望對加速天然氣水合物的勘探提供一些有益的線索。

sentences.english: He hung about the entrance all day, hoping for a chance to speak to the director.
sentences.chinese: 他在門口轉悠了一整天，企望有機會同局長談談。

sentences.english: Hope not sunshine ev'ry hour, Fear not clouds will always lower.
sentences.chinese: 不要企望時時陽光明媚，烏雲哪會總是蔽日遮天。

sentences.english: Of course we want our kids to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們都企望孩子獲得成功。
相反地，她卻對生活充滿了企望。

sentences.english: So Marx merely stated that for which the bourgeoisie has always hoped.
sentences.chinese: 因此，馬克思只是說出了資產階級一直企望的事情。

sentences.english: I start on my journey with empty hands and expectant heart.
sentences.chinese: 我只帶着空空的手和企望的心。

sentences.english: People have the wisdom, is to achieve the purpose of the what he wants.
sentences.chinese: 人有智慧，就是要達到他所企望的目標。

definition: to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
to hope for/to look forward to
to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
to look far ahead/to look forward (to)
to accomplish the whole task at one stroke (idiom)
pinyin: bi4 qi2 gong1 yu2 yi1 yi4
